message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $110 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $105. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can do $108 for the product.
